EmailTemplate.description: Ask tour attendees to complete survey
EmailTemplate.name: HOS Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: School Tour: Tell us what you think
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
Tell us what you think!
We would love your feedback on our recent Head of School tour - please complete this quick survey - https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/SACStour.
Regards
Bruce Perry Registrar/Mathematics Teacher
phone 02 92869507 email BPerry@sacs.nsw.edu.au
